Feature Notes:
Additional Fighting Style: Can select a second Fighting Style
Fighting Style: 2 selections
Martial Archetype: 1 selection
Student Of War: Tool Proficiency (Choose 1 from any Artisan)
Linguist: Can create ciphers (DC 24 Intelligence to decode)
Lucky: Can gain advantage on an attack, ability, or saving throw or inflict foe disadvantage an attack on self 3 times per long rest
Shelter Of The Faithful: Can receive aid from temples of FR-Deneir and fellow believers
Skill Proficiency: History; Insight; Religion

Skill Notes:
Linguist: Language (Choose 3 from any)
Actor: Has advantage on Deception and Performance to impersonate another person and can mimic others' speech or sounds
Bulky Armor: Has disadvantage on Stealth

Combat
Hit Points: 91 Initiative: 1 Armor Class: 17 Attacks Per Round: 4
Armor Proficiency: Heavy; Light; Shield Weapon Proficiency: Martial Weapons; Simple Weapons
Armor: Half Plate Shield: None Weapons: Greataxe (+8 1d12+2); Light Hammer (+8 1d4+2 R20/60); Rapier (+8 1d8+2); Shortbow (+9 1d6+1 R80/320); Unarmed (+8 1+2)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +20
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: +1
Extra Attack: +3 Attacks Per Round
Fighting Style (Archery): +2 ranged attacks
Fighting Style (Defense): +1 Armor Class in armor
Improved Combat Superiority: Superiority Dice increase to d12
Improved War Magic: Has increased War Magic effects
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Strength Damage Adjustment: +2
Action Surge: Can take an extra action twice per short rest
Combat Superiority: Can use a d12 Superiority Die to perform one of 9 chosen Maneuvers 6 times per short rest
Commander's Strike: Can use a Superiority Die and forego an attack to gain a bonus action directing an ally to attack; the ally uses a reaction to attack and adds the Superiority Die to its damage
Disarming Attack: Can add a Superiority Die to damage and cause the target to drop an item (DC 16 Strength neg)
Distracting Strike: Can add a Superiority Die to damage and give advantage to the next ally attack against the same foe in the same rd
Eldritch Strike: Successful attack inflicts disadvantage on the first save vs. a self spell before the end of the next turn
Evasive Footwork: Can add a Superiority Die to Armor Class during a move
Feinting Attack: Can add a Superiority Die to damage and use a bonus action to gain advantage on the attack
Fighting Style (Dueling): +2 damage with a single, one-handed melee weapon
Fighting Style (Great Weapon Fighting): Can reroll 1s and 2s on two-handed weapon damage
Fighting Style (Protection): Can use a reaction and a shield to inflict disadvantage on attacks targeting an adjacent creature
Fighting Style (Two-Weapon Fighting): Adds ability modifier to second attack damage
Goading Attack: Can add a Superiority Die to damage and inflict disadvantage on foe attacks on others (DC 16 Wisdom neg) until the end of the next turn
Great Weapon Master: Can use a bonus action to attack after scoring a critical hit or reducing a foe to 0 hit points with a melee weapon/Can make a -5 attack with a heavy weapon to inflict +10 damage
Improved Critical: Scores a critical hit on a natural 19
Know Your Enemy: Knows how foe compares to self after 1 min study
Lunging Attack: Can add a Superiority Die to damage and gain +5' melee range
Maneuvering Attack: Can add a Superiority Die to damage and allow an ally to use a reaction to move half speed with no opportunity attack from the target
Menacing Attack: Can add a Superiority Die to damage and inflict frightened (DC 16 Wisdom neg) until the end of the next turn
Parry: Can use a reaction to subtract a Superiority Die + 1 from a foe's melee damage to self
Polearm Master: Can use a bonus action to attack with the butt of a polearm, inflicting 1d4 HP bludgeoning, and a foe entering polearm reach provokes an opportunity attack
Precision Attack: Can add a Superiority Die to an attack
Pushing Attack: Can add Superiority Die to damage and push the Large or smaller target 15' (DC 16 Strength neg)
Rally: Gives the target a Superiority Die + 2 temporary hit points
Relentless: Has a minimum of 1 Superiority Die available after initiative
Riposte: After a foe melee miss, can spend a Superiority Die and use a reaction to attack and add the Superiority Die to damage
Savage Attacker: Can take the best of two melee damage rolls once per rd
Second Wind: Can use a bonus action to regain 1d10+20 hit points once per short rest
Superior Critical: Scores a critical hit on a natural 18
Survivor: Regains 6 hit points each rd when between 1 and 45 hit points
Sweeping Attack: After a successful melee attack, can inflict a Superiority Die HP on a second adjacent foe
Trip Attack: After a successful attack, can knock the Large or smaller target prone (DC 16 Strength neg) and add a Superiority Die to damage
War Magic: Can use a bonus action to make a weapon attack after casting any spell
Weapon Bond: Cannot be disarmed from a bonded weapon and can use a bonus action to summon one
Save Proficiency: Constitution; Strength
Save: Charisma: 2; Constitution: 7; Dexterity: 1; Intelligence: 4; Strength: 8; Wisdom: 1
Save Notes: Indomitable: Can reroll a failed save 3 times per long rest
Magic
Spell Slots: W0: 3; W1: 4; W2: 3; W3: 3; W4: 1 Attack: W: 10 Spell DC: W: 18
Spells:
Blur (W2 Illu): Foes suffer disadvantage when using sight to attack self for concentration up to 1 min
Chill Touch (W0 Necr): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 4d8 HP necrotic and target cannot regain hit points for 1 rd; undead also suffer disadvantage vs. self attack for 1 rd
Disguise Self (W1 Illu): Changes the appearance of self body and clothing for 1 hr; physical investigation detects the illusion
Expeditious Retreat (W1 Tran): Self gains a bonus Dash once per rd for concentration up to 10 min
Leomund's Tiny Hut (W3 Evoc): Creates a 10' radius dome, impassable by objects and spells, for 8 hr [R]
Levitate (W2 Tran): R60' Target floats (save Constitution neg) and can be moved up or down 20' each rd for concentration up to 10 min
Magic Circle (W3 Abju): R10' 10' radius prevents a choice of physical entry or exit (save Charisma allows magical transit), inflicts disadvantage on attacks, and negates charm, fright, and possession by one or more choices of celestials, fey, fiends, or undead, for 1 hr [+Level extends the duration +1 hr]
Message (W0 Tran): R120' Self and target can hold a whispered conversation for 1 rd
Polymorph (W4 Tran): R60' Transforms the target creature (save Wisdom neg; shapechangers automatically succeed) for concentration up to 1 hr or until reduced to 0 HP
See Invisibility (W2 Divi): Reveals invisible and ethereal creatures and objects for 1 hr
Shocking Grasp (W0 Evoc): Touched suffers 4d8 HP lightning and loss of reactions until its next turn
Tasha's Hideous Laughter (W1 Ench): R30' Inflicts ROFL (save Wisdom ends) for concentration up to 1 min
Tongues (W3 Divi): Touched understands any language and is universally understood for 1 hr
Unseen Servant (W1 Conj): R60' Invisible force with AC 10, 1 hit point, and Strength 2 can move 15' per rd and performs simple tasks for 1 hr or until damaged [R]
Magic Notes:
Arcane Charge: Can teleport 30' during Action Surge
Spellcasting: Can cast spells from the wizard spell list
Notes
